name: EternalLife
description: The player controls a small platform-a racket that can be moved horizontally from one wall to another, substituting it under the ball, preventing it from falling down. The impact of the ball on the brick leads to the destruction of the brick. After all the bricks on this level are destroyed, you move to the next level, with a new set of bricks. There is also some variety: certain bricks need to be hit several times.
